forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of winter precipitation this morning. Then snow mixing with rain at times this afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix this morning will change to a rain and snow mix for the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
